long_description: A smooth-rolling aluminum wheel without the premium price tag, the Mavic Aksium S Front Wheel offers serious riders and racers durability and light weight. Lightweight 24mm deep aluminum rim features a milled braking surface to improve friction; rim is also strengthened where it gets the greatest stress, improving durability. 20 straight-pull bladed steel spokes cut through the wind and are extremely stiff; spokes are laced radially. Hub features a lightweight yet stiff aluminum hub body and double-sealed cartridge bearings for excellent longevity and smooth spinning. Aksion foldable tire uses a single rubber compound and offers a 60 tpi casing for good all-around performance and longevity; max tire pressure of 130 psi. Mavic Aksium S Front Wheel comes with a quick-release skewer, rim tape, butyl tube and Aksium 700 x 23 tire.
short_description: A smooth-rolling aluminum wheel without the premium price tag, the Mavic Aksium S Front Wheel offers serious riders and racers durability and light weight.
